Node.definition: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Hilkiah (חִלְקִיָּה) ► prophet (נָבִיא)
= state in which a countable entity is the second in a range

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= causative action by which humans put other humans in a position by which they can no longer move at will
= area enclosed by walls or buildings

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans or deities create an object, ◄ described as an artisan shaping clay into an artifact

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= causative action by which humans or deities bring an object into existence
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= state in which certain information is not generally accessible, with the exception of a priviliged small group
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= earthen mound, cast up against the wall of a city ► in order to enable to enemy to scale the wall
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression
= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= descendant of Chesed (כֶּשֶׂד) son of Nahor (נָחֹור) and their land
= causative action by which someone causes a certain location, container, or surface to be filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= body of an animal or human that has died or been killed; ► source of pollution and impurity
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke
= state in which humans and deities experience excitement ◄ caused by anger
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

literally: to hide (one's) face (from someone); hence: = action by which a deity does not engage with people, and does not intervene neither in their favor nor to punish, ◄ as if he were enable to see them

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong, resulting in a state of guilt and, eventually, hardship and suffering
literally: to bring (upon); hence: = causative process by which deities cause certain events to happen to others
= act of restoring someone's health

= causative action by which humans or deities help or cause (other) humans to be restored to health or physical strength after a disease or an accident; this could also refer to the wound or disease itself
= causative action by which a human being or deity causes an object or event to become visible to others
meaning unsure: = large quantity
= state in which a condition is trustworthy in that it lasts for a prolonged time

Node.gloss: to restore the fortunes (of a nation)
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities restore the well being of an indivual or group

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= causative action by which deities restore the well being of an indivual or group

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= causative action by which deities restore the well being of an indivual or group

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
literally: to cleanse; hence: = causative action by which deities cause humans to be free of moral contamination
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which a person or group challenges or defies an authority or agreement
literally: name; hence: = the information that is generally known about a person or deity, which may either be good or bad and has a direct impact on the way this person or deity is regarded
= state in which humans or deities are considered worthy of praise

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

Node.gloss: to cause to happen|to bring about

= woman who is about to be married or has just been married; ≈ often associated with joy

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= state in which humans and deities have character, integrity, and good fortune
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
particle linking two objects, of which the first is not always listed explicitly; = relation indicating that object X and object Y are at opposite ends of a range of similar objects
often used as collective: = general term for any land animal, as opposed to humans (אָדָם) birds (עֹוף) reptiles (רֶמֶשׂ) insects (שֶׁרֶץ) and fish (דָּג)

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= causative action by which humans cause animals to assume a horizontal position in order to rest

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= an area dominated by elevations of the earth's surface

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

literally: the lowland; = the area situated between the hill country (הַר) and the coastal plain, which consists of foothills; named thus by the Israelites who occupied the hill country; known for its olive trees (זַיִת) and sycamore trees (שִׁקְמָה)

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= an area of land located in the south of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) consisting of little vegetation and with very little annual rainfall; inhabited by numerous peoples initially by the Canaanites in Arad (עֲרָד) and the Amelekites (עֲמָלֵקִי) later, the people of Judah (יְהוּדָה)

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine

Node.gloss: to cause to sprout|to make come up|to cause to bring forth
Node.definition: = causative process by which a deity or the earth causes plants or horns to come up and start growing; ≈ sometimes extended to denote the coming in existence of people, conditions, or activities
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: sprout; hence: = a new member of a royal dynasty, ◄ compared to a new branch that sprouts from a tree

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= practices that conform to the laws of God

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= state in which humans live with confidence and without fear; ≈ often regarded as carelessness, especially when there is no mention of trust in YHWH
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to cry out; hence: = action by which humans or deities assign a name to a person, place, object, or phenomenon
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to be cut off|to be lacking
Node.definition: literally: to be cut off; hence: = process by which a certain category of people stops existing within a particular group
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: to sit on a throne; hence: = action by which humans or deities assume a position of leadership, ◄ symbolized by taking position on the seat that represents this position of authority
the throne representing someone's position as monarch or judge
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties

Node.gloss: to be cut off|to be lacking
Node.definition: literally: to be cut off; hence: = process by which a certain category of people stops existing within a particular group
literally: to make go up; hence: = causative process by which humans offer a burnt offering and cause its smoke to go up
= causative action by which humans set alight and cause smoke to rise from the sacrificial fat parts of an animal, of grain and other offerings, including incense ► as an offering to a deity
= an offering consisting of grain or a grain product, which usually accompanies an animal sacrifice

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
literally: all the days; hence: = process by which an event or pattern of events takes place for an extended time, without interruption
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Hilkiah (חִלְקִיָּה) ► prophet (נָבִיא)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses
= the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= particle marking a proposition as not true
= during the daytime
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
the throne representing someone's position as monarch or judge
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action with which one determines or estimates the number of a collection of persons or objects

Node.gloss: host of heaven|sun, moon, and stars
Node.definition: = collective of all celestial bodies that give light; ◄ created by God; ► often worshiped by people, contrary to God's law; ≈ in Daniel 8 possibly used as a metaphor for the people of God

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
= action by which humans or deities ascertain the size or quantity of something by comparing it with a standard unit or with an object of known size

= minute fragments; ◄ resulting from wearing down of esp. siliceous rocks and found covering parts of the sea shore, river beds, deserts, etc.; ► contains materials for the production of dye and glass; ≈ symbol of large quantity
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a person’s child or children, or the young of an animal
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= man; ◄ son of Hilkiah (חִלְקִיָּה) ► prophet (נָבִיא)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= a particular group or class of either people (as in a clan or tribe) or animals (as in a genus or species) that share common characteristics
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to engage in any way with (other) humans or deities, or with other objects and events

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to engage in any way with (other) humans or deities, or with other objects and events, often caused by pride and contempt

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses
= during the daytime
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= pattern of behavior required from someone by somebody in authority
= a more or less fixed phrase: the heavens and the earth, equivalent to a single lexical item: the totality of God's creation

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an event to happen ◄ as if it were an object placed in a certain position

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= a person’s child or children, or the young of an animal

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

= a person’s child or children, or the young of an animal
= a person’s child or children, or the young of an animal
= man, also known as Abram (אַבְרָם) ◄ son of Terah (תֶּרַח) ► first patriarch of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) father of Ishmael (יִשְׁמָעֵאל) and Isaac (יִצְחָק)
= man; ◄ son of Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) and Sarah (שָׂרָה) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) father of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and Jacob (יַעֲקֹב)

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

Node.gloss: to restore the fortunes (of a nation)
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities restore the well being of an indivual or group

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= causative action by which deities restore the well being of an indivual or group

Node.gloss: to be merciful|to have mercy (on someone)|to have compassion (on someone)
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities feel compassion for other, ◄ caused by affection for that person and/or the lack of well being of that person; ► this feeling is usually translated into action: a person who feels compassion may forgive an offence, refrain from aggression and/or punishment, or revoke punishment
